properties.title: Urban Sketches: Victoria Versicherung
properties.description:
A short video about one of the few historicl buildngs surviving destruction in this area.
Script / Editing: Paula Mangold, Vicky Kiefer
Images by Paula Mangold, Vicky Kiefer
Realised  in July 2017 with the support of the Erasmus+ EULER program

A series of short video postcards from Mehringplatz. 
These audiovisual fragments are realised by the participants to the EULER - Mehringplatz Anknipsen laboratory. They experiment a simple and accessible format to capture an impression, report an observation or tell a story about the local identity. Complementing the collection of historical and analytical materials, they provide a layer of personal interpretation to the representation of the socio-spatial milieu.
properties.category-description: To collect personal perspective and voices, oral histories, interviews and documentations.

properties.title: Urban Sketches: Places for all times
properties.description:
Things worth noticing in the ordinary city.

by Rasha Kanjarawi 
رشا قنجراوي

properties.title: Urban Sketches: Development, Who Is It For
properties.description:
The narrative looks into the vulnerability and protection schemes affecting existing tenants and shop owners in Mehringplatz through a personal point of view account, contextualising the interest in the subject and also draws on a third party's knowledge and opinion on this question. 

Script Nathalie Bekdache
Edited by oginoknauss
Images from the Mehringplatz Memory Card set

properties.title: Candy Hartmann - Quartiersmanagement
properties.description:
interview with Candy Hartmann
QM Mehringplatz // Kunstwelt e.V.

Recorded 14.08.2017 at Quartiermanagement 
by Daniele Tognozzi, Paula Mangold
Camera and editing Manuela Conti - ogino:knauss


This video is part of a set of interviews to local social, economic and institutional stakeholders realised  for the Mehringplatz Solidarity Curriculum, a neighbourhood atlas aimed at survey existing resources and potentialities of the Südliche Friedrichstadt in the framework of the EULER Erasmus+ project.
properties.category-description: To collect personal perspective and voices, oral histories, interviews and documentations.

properties.title: Mehringplatz Anknipsen
properties.description: A community-led atlas of the Südliche Friedrichstadt - Berlin
